## IPrecomputedClientConfig.useIndexedDB property

Use IndexedDB for storing flag configurations and assignment cache instead of localStorage. IndexedDB provides larger storage capacity (\~50MB+) compared to localStorage (\~5-10MB). (default: false)

**Signature:**

```typescript
useIndexedDB?: boolean;
```
